body_content.explanation: an occasion when things are joined in the wrong way, or a place where things are joined in the wrong way:
examples: Healing of this type of lesion can result in the misconnection of nerve fibres.
Smoke will be piped through the sewers to show any possible breaks in pipes or misconnections.

body_content.explanation: an occasion when buses, planes, etc. do not arrive and leave at the right times, with the result that passengers and bags cannot go from one to the other:
examples: They said that airlines may blame one another over lost baggage or misconnections.
